tool_description: An API Showing Latest News , Information and Updates of various Crypto Currencies around the world
name: Crypto Changes live
title: Crypto Changes live

api_list.name: Get Individual Crypto News
api_list.description: Get News about Crypto from a specific Source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-changes-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/solana"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-changes-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-changes-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{cryptocurrencyid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-changes-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Crypto Currency News And Updates
